actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining

official_title: A bill to require the collection of certain data relating to Bureau of Land Management land acquisitions, and for other purposes.

summary.text: This bill requires the Bureau of Land Management to report certain data on its land acquisitions and to develop guidance to ensure that this data is properly entered and coded in its data system.

titles.title: A bill to require the collection of certain data relating to Bureau of Land Management land acquisitions, and for other purposes.
A bill to require the collection of certain data relating to Bureau of Land Management land acquisitions, and for other purposes.
